name: Flying Fly - Cavern Adventures Of A Rasta Hornet
name_original: Flying Fly - Cavern Adventures Of A Rasta Hornet
description:
Pick your favorite fly, strap on your jetpack, zip through the colorful caves filled with dangers and prepare for a Fly flying adventure! It’s a ride you will never forget! 

How to Play:
* Dodge the strong walls and break through the weak walls for extra points!
* Collect speed boosters to smash through the strong walls
* Press and hold to go up, release to go down to avoid hitting any walls!

Features:
* FLY WITH FLIES: Unlock 4 different fabulous flies (2 girls, 2 guys)
* EXPLORE THE CAVES: 40 different achievements/challenges awaits
* NEED SOME HELP?: Awesome Power Ups, like Jet Pack or Invincibility and more…
* EASY TO LEARN: One touch Addictive gameplay with colorful graphics
* KEEP TRACK: of your scores and compete with others on the Leader Boards
* BUZZ YOUR SCORES: on Facebook

You will love the colorful graphics, the cute buzzing hornets, and the awesome challenges, definitely one of the best flying games out right now! 

We welcome all of your comments and suggestions at strictlyhighgrade@yahoo.com
